original_text: That servant will be very happy when his master comes home. His master will see that he has done everything well.
korean_text: 주인이 올 때에 그 종이 이렇게 하는 것을 보면 그 종이 복이 있으리로다

sentences.original_text: That servant will be very happy
that he has done everything well
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 모든 것을 잘 했다는 것을
